description:
-Anime-Suki No.1Ã£ï¿½Â®Ã£â€šÂ¢Ã£Æ’Æ’Ã£Æ’â€”Ã£Æ’Â­Ã£Æ’Â¼Ã£Æ’â‚¬: Ã£â€šÂ¹Ã£Æ’Â¼Ã£Æ’â€˜Ã£Æ’Â¼Ã¢Ëœâ€¦Ã£Æ’â„¢Ã£â€šÂ¹Ã£Æ’Ë†Ã£Æ’Â»Ã£Æ’Ë†Ã£Æ’Â©Ã£Æ’Â³Ã£â€šÂ¹, TRANCE RAVE Ã£Æ’â„¢Ã£â€šÂ¹Ã£Æ’Ë†, Ã£â€šÂ¹Ã£Æ’Â¼Ã£Æ’â€˜Ã£Æ’Â¼Ã£Æ’Â¦Ã£Æ’Â¼Ã£Æ’Â­Ã£Æ’â€œÃ£Æ’Â¼Ã£Æ’Ë†

-The one and only album from Missing Heart produced by Germany's BROS. Team (JOHN O'FLYNN, DAVID BRANDES, FELIX GAUDER & DOMENICO LABARILLE) and published by Toshiba-EMI's Intercord Japan (i-DANCE) label. This rare album was only released in Japan and has over the years become VERY expensive to obtain and own. Remastered and completly restored.

-Originally the vocals for Missing Heart was Lyane Leigh (1994-1999) but after she left she was replaced by Lydia Madajewski (1999-2002). All the songs on the album are sung by Lydia except "Moonlight Shadow" which is the original version by Lyane Leigh.
